# Nokia 7750 SR OS VPLS Service Configuration

configure
    service
        customer 100
            description "Enterprise Customer A"
        exit
        vpls 1000 customer 100 create
            description "Customer-A VPLS"
            service-mtu 1500
            admin-state enable
            sap 1/1/3:100 create
                description "Customer-A Site-1"
                admin-state enable
                ingress
                    qos 10
                exit
                egress
                    qos 10
                exit
            exit
            sap 1/1/4:100 create
                description "Customer-A Site-2"
                admin-state enable
            exit
            spoke-sdp 100:1000 create
                admin-state enable
            exit
            mesh-sdp 200:1000 create
                admin-state enable
            exit
        exit
        vprn 2000 customer 100 create
            description "Customer-A L3VPN"
            route-distinguisher 65001:2000
            vrf-target target:65001:2000
            admin-state enable
            interface "ce-a-1" create
                address 10.100.1.1/30
                sap 1/1/5:200 create
                    admin-state enable
                exit
            exit
            interface "ce-a-2" create
                address 10.100.2.1/30
                sap 1/1/6:200 create
                    admin-state enable
                exit
            exit
        exit
        epipe 3000 customer 100 create
            description "Point-to-Point Service"
            admin-state enable
            sap 1/1/7:300 create
                admin-state enable
            exit
            spoke-sdp 100:3000 create
                admin-state enable
            exit
        exit
    exit
exit
